post.text: So...what exactly did we learn tonight about Donald Trump's economic plan? #RNCinCLE

comment.author: Kayla
comment.text: His economic plan is to ensure Hillary never makes it to the Whitehouse. Throwing around taxpayers money for votes has run its course

replies.author: Carissa
replies.text: Which is why he's currently begging for taxpayer money. What a saint.

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: 40 million in poverty is a stellar record Hillary wants to continue?
